liste.punkt: In the application for parental benefit, state that you are going to postpone because you are sick or in a health institution.
If you have already applied, log in at Your parental benefit and submit a modification application instead.

innhold.avsnitt: You must attach this to your application

liste.punkt: You've fallen ill: Attach a medical certificate. The doctor must describe specifically how the disease or injury makes you fully dependent on help to be able to take care of the child. That is, what parts of the care of the child you can not do because of the disease or injury. It must also say how long the disease or injury will last. Regular sick leave is not sufficient.
You are in a health institution: Attach documentation from the health institution for the period of hospitalization.

innhold.avsnitt: Application deadline: You must apply within 3 months.
